member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.RemoteReader.RemoteRequestEventArgs.RemoteUrl
member.summary: The url to the remotely hosted image.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.RemoteReader.RemoteRequestEventArgs.QueryString
member.summary: Resizing settings. These are not signed - other parties can manipulate them.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.RemoteReader.RemoteRequestEventArgs.SignedRequest
member.summary: True if the remote url was (correctly) signed with an HMAC SHA-256 to verify that it had not be altered since it was generated by the same server (or another server with the same key).

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.RemoteReader.RemoteReaderPlugin.PreLoadImage(System.Object@,System.String@,System.Boolean@,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings@)
member.summary: Allows .Build and .LoadImage to resize remote URLs

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.RemoteReader.RemoteReaderPlugin.Current
member.summary: Returns the currently registered RemoteReaderPlugin, or adds a new RemoteReaderPlugin automatically if one is not registered.
